title: Life lessons with self-made billionaire Kiran Mazumdar Shaw
text:
Nearly 35 years after she set out with Rs 10,000 and a business plan, Kiran Mazumdar Shaw is counted among India’s most influential women. The chairman and managing director of Biocon, India’s premier bio-pharmaceuticals company, Kiran Mazumdar Shaw shares her recipe of success. The role model states the importance of philanthropy, especially in India, where people need to be sensitive and care about the poorer, more disadvantaged sections of our country. Money is not a currency to buy favours with, but a currency with which you can make a difference, is a principle that she holds close to her heart. Watch and be inspired!
